name: UX Research - Melody HiFi Wireframes
description:
Here is what I was building for so long.


After doing UX research and sharing Lo-Fi Wireframes before, here is a complete solution for Melody App.


The app makes it easy for user to share their music taste with friends on a single tap and can easily visualise their listening habits on Daily, Monthly basis.


Do share your inputs.


In this file you will find:

  1. Research Information: Competitive Analysis, plotting, challenges.
  2. Lo-Fi Wireframes
  3. Hi-Fi Wireframes
  4. Style Guide


Hope you will like it.


DO check out project here: https://www.shivanshumathur.tech/melody.html


Thanks!
